NXN XLevel 1. FreshieAnswered on 01 Mar 2019Yes. Low investment cost. Low maintenance cost. Diversified. Irish domiciled ones are not liable for dividend withholding tax.  Biggest yes if cash flow is important. Else can go for vanguard world.0 comments0
